testcase.name: 1. Verify that user can view the current month's score and the division of contributions
2. Verify that user can open all the contribution's drop down and read the title
3. Verify that user can click on the chart, which opens the drop down and highlight the type of contribution
4. Verify that user is able to change the month which changes the chart and the contribution
5. Verify when the user hovers on the chart the contribution name should be displayed
6. Verify user can see all time score
